translation.en: -[meowing] -♪ No matter what we wear ♪ ♪ We're gonna be right there ♪
translation.es: No importa lo que usemos, ahí estaremos.

translation.en: -♪ Jump to it, jump to it ♪ -[Charm Alarms chirping]
♪ So let's suit up And save the day ♪
translation.es: Nos pondremos los trajesy salvaremos el día.

translation.en: ♪ Gowns and crowns are always fun, And when it's time to get things done ♪
translation.es: Los vestidos y las coronas son divertidos,pero, cuando el deber llama,

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
-♪ Let's go! ♪ -♪ Glide or sail, or hop a plane ♪
translation.es: ¡Vamos! Planea, navega, sube a un avión.

translation.en: ♪ We'll change the world The Princess way ♪
translation.es: Al modo de las princesas,cambiaremos el mundo.

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
♪ With the Fruitdoms in our hands ♪
♪ These Princesses wear pants! ♪
[all] Princess Power!
Okay, Fussy, your "mani-purry" is done.
translation.es: Bien, Fussy, tu garricura está lista.

translation.en: Did you say "purr-fect"? Glad we agree.
Penny darling, I was just downstairs checking in on, ah, ah!
Uh, I was gonna clean that up.
Penny, I'm not asking for perfection,
but yes... [chuckles] please do clean that up, and... that.
translation.es: pero sí, por favor, limpia eso y…todo esto.

translation.en: Take the mess and make it less. Consider it done.
translation.es: No al desorden y sí al orden. Lo haré.

translation.en: Thank you.
And I've got just the thing.
My newest creation is ready!
Behold! The Super-Duper Clutter Picker-Upper!
This solution will make a bubble that can pick up any mess anywhere any time.
translation.es: Esta solución haceque una burbuja limpie todo desorden.

translation.en: It'll revolutionize cleaning all over the Fruitdom!
translation.es: Revolucionará la limpiezaen todo el frutirreino.

translation.en: It's unstoppable, it's unpoppable!
But not Fussy-proof.
translation.es: No es a prueba de Fussy.

translation.en: I guess it's back to the drawing board.
[gasps] The Charm Alarm!
Kira needs us!
-[purrs] -Come on, Fussy!
♪ Let's go, let's go Na na na na na na ♪
♪ When the trouble in our world Feels too big for one alone ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪ -♪ Na na na na na na ♪
translation.es: Cuando los problemas del mundoparecen grandes para una sola,

translation.en: -♪ We jump right into action ♪ -♪ That's right! ♪ -♪ To help those in need ♪ -♪ Okay! ♪
translation.es: saltamos a la acciónpara ayudar a quien lo necesita.

translation.en: ♪ Every mistake we make ♪ -♪ Is just a step along the way ♪ -Whoo-hoo!
translation.es: Cada error que cometemoses un paso en el camino.

translation.en: ♪ So let's go, go, go, Come on let's take on the day ♪
translation.es: Así que ¡vamos! Vamos, enfrentemos el día.

translation.en: -♪ Let's take on the day ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
♪ We'll just try 'til we get it right! ♪
translation.es: Lo intentaremos hasta que lo logremos.

translation.en: ♪ And never give up the fight! ♪ ♪ 'Cause that's the Princess way! ♪
translation.es: ¡Nunca nos rendiremos ante la lucha!Porque eso hacen las princesas.

translation.en: Princesses, I need your help! Mr. Scrumples ran up the fireplace.
translation.es: Princesas, ayúdenme.El señor Scrumples subió a la chimenea.

translation.en: He's too scared to come down and too high for me to reach him!
translation.es: Tiene miedo de bajary yo no puedo alcanzarlo.

translation.en: A trapped Teenykin?
That's a huge-ikin disaster! Of course we'll help!
translation.es: ¿Un pequeñín atrapado?¡Es un enorme desastre! Claro que ayudaremos.

translation.en: We Pinkie Tea Promise to help those in need.
translation.es: Prometemos ayudar a quien lo necesita.

translation.en: [all] With our Princess Power, we'll always succeed!
To the Kiwi Fruitdom!
[Penny] Wow, that's a big fireplace.
We're supposed to find one little hamster inside?
Challenge accepted.
Work with me, pal! I'm trying to get you unstuck!
translation.es: Ayúdame, amigo. Quiero sacarte de aquí.

translation.en: Ugh, now I'm stuck too! Fireplace: one. Bea: zero.
translation.es: Ahora yo me quedaré aquí.Chimenea: uno, Bea: cero.

translation.en: A little help, Princesses?
Any chance you've got a rope in that kit?
Not yet.
But I'll fashion up a be-dazzlous one before I can say...
translation.es: No, pero crearé una deslumbrallosa antes de decir…

translation.en: Hold on, Bea!
Nice pull, Rita.
[pants] Thanks. My fashions are fantabulous and functional.
translation.es: Gracias. Mis creacionesson fantabulosas y funcionales.

translation.en: I tried, but I think Mr. Scrumples only likes you.
translation.es: Lo intenté, pero al señor Scrumplessolo le agradas tú.

translation.en: Bee stings!
If I were a bird, I'd soar up and carry him out! But I can't.
translation.es: Si fuera un ave,volaría y lo sacaría, pero no puedo.

translation.en: But my unstoppable, unpoppable bubble can!
translation.es: Mi burbuja imparablee indestructible sí puede.

translation.en: Your unpoppable, boppable w-w-what?
I can send a bubble up the chimney
translation.es: Enviaré una burbuja por la chimeneapara que lo recoja

translation.en: that'll pick up Mr. Scrumples and float him out the top!
translation.es: Enviaré una burbuja por la chimeneapara que lo recoja y lo saque de ahí.

translation.en: Then I can catch him when he comes out!
translation.es: Y así podré atraparlo cuando salga.

translation.en: And I'll bring four extra paws so I can't miss. -Come on, Fussy. -[shrieks]
translation.es: Llevaré cuatro patas extrapara no fallar. Vamos, Fussy.

translation.en: This'll be my strongest bubble yet.
translation.es: Esta será la burbuja más fuerte.

translation.en: Heads up, Kira! It's comin'!
Let's go to the balcony and see if it works.
translation.es: Vamos al balcón a ver si funciona.

translation.en: Fussy, do you see Mr. Scrumples? Is he close?
[gasps] Fussy!
Oh. The bubble got you. I'm so glad.
translation.es: La burbuja te atrapó. Qué alegría.

translation.en: [gasps] And now it got me!
Princesses, look!
Well, on the plus side, your bubble worked.
Too well!
We gotta stop them before they float away!
translation.es: Detengámoslos antes de que se alejen…

translation.en: Or before Fussy pops that bubble!
translation.es: o de que Fussy la explote.

translation.en: To the Pineapple plane!
Everything looks so tiny from up here.
translation.es: Desde aquí, todo se ve pequeño.

translation.en: It's kinda soothing, don't you think?
Fussy, no! If you pop this bubble, we all fall.
translation.es: Fussy, ¡no! Si la explotas, nos caeremos.

translation.en: Make a beeline for that bubble!
Science snag. When we get close, the propeller blows it away!
translation.es: Santas ciencias.Al acercarnos, el propulsor la aleja.

translation.en: Oh, ruffles! It's spinning out of control toward the Pineapple Fruitdom!
translation.es: ¡Chispitas! Se dirigenhacia el frutirreino de la Piña.

translation.en: Don't worry, Fussy. We're safe, I promise.
translation.es: Tranquila, Fussy.Estamos a salvo, lo juro.

translation.en: This is an epic case of bubble trouble!
And it's not over! Now the bubble's headed right for that pelican!
translation.es: Y aún no termina.La burbuja se dirige hacia ese pelícano.

translation.en: Uh-oh. That pelican can burst our bubble with his beak.
translation.es: El pelícano puede reventar la burbuja.

translation.en: Think, think, think.
If I were a bird, what would shoo me away?
translation.es: Si fuera un ave, ¿qué me espantaría?

translation.en: A coyote!
Wait!
You don't want to peck that bubble.
translation.es: No picotees la burbuja. Puedes picotear

translation.en: You want to peck a tantalizing tuna fish tea sandwich.
translation.es: No picotees la burbuja. Puedes picotear un tentador sándwich de atún.

translation.en: [sighs] That was too, too, too close.
And interesting.
The pelican's added weight made the bubble lower a little.
translation.es: Con el peso del pelícano, la burbuja bajó.

translation.en: So if my calculations are correct, if we add more weight to the bubble,
translation.es: Si mis cálculos son correctos,si le añadimos más peso,

translation.en: it'll get lower and lower until it lands!
translation.es: bajará cada vez más hasta aterrizar.

translation.en: Science success!
Okay! So how do we put things in the bubble if we can't get close to it?
translation.es: Bien. ¿Cómo añadiremos peso a la burbujasi no podemos acercarnos?

translation.en: Oh, oh, oh! I know! It's all in the wrist. And the kit.
translation.es: Ya sé. Todo está en la muñeca y en el kit.

translation.en: I can fashion up a be-dazzlous slingshot!
Sweet! But where do we find stuff to sling?
Check around your feet!
[gasps] This thing is loaded with stuff! Here you go, Rita!
translation.es: Hay muchas cosas aquí. Aquí tienes, Rita.

translation.en: True story: you gotta keep stuff around
translation.es: Debes tener objetos a la mano,

translation.en: 'cause you'll never know when you'll have to Princess on the go.
Okay, for real, those boots look so good on you.
translation.es: Oye, esas botas te quedan muy bien.

translation.en: It's working! Oh, but I'm out of stuff to sling!
Me too! Everything else is bolted down.
translation.es: Yo tampoco. Lo demás está atornillado.

translation.en: Well, I'm not bolted down.
Penny, fly over the bubble. I'm going in!
What? That sounds like the worst idea since socks with sandals!
translation.es: ¿Qué? ¡Es una mala idea,como los calcetines con sandalias!

translation.en: Are you sure?
You got nothing to show for it if you don’t go for it.
translation.es: No hay nada que demostrarsi no lo intentas.

translation.en: Get ready, Bea!
One, two, three.
Go!
Ugh! Am I late for tea?
-[Fussy meows] -Oops! Sorry, Fussy.
-[meows] -Teenykin-tastic timing!
Especially since we're so low in the sky. I think we might be landing.
translation.es: Ya estamos muy abajo.Creo que ya aterrizaremos.

translation.en: Please return your seats to their full upright position.
translation.es: Pongan sus asientos en posición vertical.

translation.en: Gutter ball. I didn't get us low enough to land.
But Penny's bedroom is right there!
translation.es: La habitación de Penny está allí.

translation.en: And if this bubble was a puzzle piece,
translation.es: Si la burbuja fuerauna pieza de rompecabezas,

translation.en: it would fit right inside Penny's bedroom window!
But we're not floating towards Penny's window.
translation.es: Pero no flotamoshacia la ventana de Penny.

translation.en: We will be! Everybody, run with me!
For real? They're exercising now?
No. They're controlling the bubble's direction!
translation.es: No. Controlan la dirección de la burbuja.

translation.en: It's bubble brilliant!
Brace yourself for impact!
Three, two, one!
[Bea] Ricochet bank shot for the win!
Goal!
Game, set, and match, Bea!
Now, we can burst that bubble and set you free!
translation.es: Ahora podemos reventarla burbuja y liberarlos.

translation.en: Wait! If you touch the bubble, you'll get pulled inside too!
translation.es: ¡Espera! Si la tocas, te meterás adentro.

translation.en: But nothing's Fussy-proof.
translation.es: Pero nada es a prueba de Fussy.

translation.en: It's your time to shine, Fussy!
Duck!
I think you meant "cat."
Huh. This is new.
I never know what kind of surprise I'll find in here.
translation.es: Nunca sé qué sorpresas encontraré aquí.

translation.en: At least it keeps things interesting.
Hey, pelican. Boots off the bed.
translation.es: Pelícano, botas fuera de la cama.

translation.en: Need help cleaning up, Penny? I would love some help.
translation.es: - ¿Te ayudamos a limpiar, Penny?- Me encantaría.

translation.en: ♪ No matter what we wear We're gonna be right there ♪
translation.es: No importa lo que usemos, ahí estaremos.

translation.en: -♪ Jump to it ♪ -♪ Jump to it ♪
♪ So let's suit up And save the day ♪
translation.es: Nos pondremos los trajesy salvaremos el día.

translation.en: ♪ Gowns and crowns are always fun, And when it's time to get things done ♪
translation.es: Los vestidos y las coronas son divertidos,pero, cuando el deber llama,

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
-♪ Let's go! ♪ -♪ Glide or sail, or hop a plane ♪
translation.es: ¡Vamos! Planea, navega, sube a un avión.

translation.en: ♪ We'll change the world The Princess way ♪
translation.es: Al modo de las princesas,cambiaremos el mundo.

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
♪ With the Fruitdoms in our hands ♪
♪ These Princesses wear pants! ♪
